verses.verse: <S%H8055>Don't<s%> rejoice, <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> to <S%H1524>jubilation<s%> like the <S%H5971>nations;<s%> for you were unfaithful to your <S%H430>God.<s%> You <S%H157>love<s%> the <S%H868>wages<s%> of a <S%H2181>prostitute<s%> at every grain threshing <S%H1637>floor.<s%>
The threshing <S%H1637>floor<s%> and the <S%H3342>winepress<s%> <S%H7462>won't<s%> feed <S%H8492>them,<s%> and the new wine will fail <S%H3584>her.<s%>

They <S%H3427>won't<s%> dwell in <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%>'s <S%H776>land;<s%> but <S%H669>Ephraim<s%> will <S%H7725>return<s%> to <S%H4714>Egypt,<s%> and they will <S%H398>eat<s%> <S%H2931>unclean<s%> food in <S%H804>Assyria.<s%>

They <S%H5258>won't<s%> pour out <S%H3196>wine<s%> offerings to <S%H3068>Yahweh,<s%> neither will they be <S%H6149>pleasing<s%> to <S%H2077>him.<s%> Their sacrifices will be to them like the <S%H3899>bread<s%> of <S%H205>mourners;<s%> all who <S%H398>eat<s%> of it will be <S%H2930>polluted;<s%> for their <S%H3899>bread<s%> will be for their <S%H5315>appetite.<s%> It will not <S%H935>come<s%> into the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H3068>Yahweh.<s%>
What will you <S%H6213>do<s%> in the <S%H3117>day<s%> of <S%H4150>solemn<s%> <S%H3117>assembly,<s%> and in the day of the <S%H2282>feast<s%> of <S%H3068>Yahweh?<s%>

<S%H1980>For,<s%> behold, they have gone away from <S%H7701>destruction.<s%> <S%H4714>Egypt<s%> will gather them <S%H6908>up.<s%> <S%H4644>Memphis<s%> will <S%H6912>bury<s%> <S%H7057>them.<s%> Nettles will <S%H3423>possess<s%> their <S%H4261>pleasant<s%> things of <S%H3701>silver.<s%> <S%H2336>Thorns<s%> will be in their <S%H168>tents.<s%>

The <S%H3117>days<s%> of <S%H6486>visitation<s%> have <S%H935>come.<s%> The <S%H3117>days<s%> of <S%H7966>reckoning<s%> have <S%H935>come.<s%> <S%H3478>Israel<s%> will <S%H3045>consider<s%> the <S%H5030>prophet<s%> to be a <S%H191>fool,<s%> and the <S%H376>man<s%> who is <S%H7307>inspired<s%> to be <S%H7696>insane,<s%> because of the <S%H7230>abundance<s%> of your <S%H5771>sins,<s%> and because your <S%H4895>hostility<s%> is <S%H7227>great.<s%>

A <S%H5030>prophet<s%> <S%H6822>watches<s%> over <S%H669>Ephraim<s%> with my <S%H430>God.<s%> A <S%H3352>fowler<s%>'s <S%H6341>snare<s%> is on all of his <S%H1870>paths,<s%> and <S%H4895>hostility<s%> in the <S%H1004>house<s%> of his <S%H430>God.<s%>

They have <S%H6009>deeply<s%> <S%H7843>corrupted<s%> <S%H3117>themselves,<s%> as in the days of <S%H1390>Gibeah.<s%> He will <S%H2142>remember<s%> their <S%H5771>iniquity.<s%> He will <S%H6485>punish<s%> them for their <S%H2403>sins.<s%>

I <S%H4672>found<s%> <S%H3478>Israel<s%> like <S%H6025>grapes<s%> in the <S%H4057>wilderness.<s%> I <S%H7200>saw<s%> your <S%H1>fathers<s%> as the first <S%H1063>ripe<s%> in the fig <S%H8384>tree<s%> at its first <S%H7225>season;<s%> but they <S%H935>came<s%> to <S%H1187>Baal<s%> <S%H5144>Peor,<s%> and consecrated themselves to the <S%H1322>shameful<s%> <S%H5144>thing,<s%> and became abominable like that which they <S%H157>loved.<s%>

As for <S%H669>Ephraim,<s%> their <S%H3519>glory<s%> will fly <S%H5774>away<s%> like a <S%H5775>bird.<s%> There will be no <S%H3205>birth,<s%> none with <S%H990>child,<s%> and no <S%H2032>conception.<s%>

Though they bring <S%H1431>up<s%> their <S%H1121>children,<s%> yet I will <S%H7921>bereave<s%> <S%H120>them,<s%> so that not a man shall be <S%H188>left.<s%> Indeed, woe also to them when I depart from <S%H5493>them!<s%>

I have <S%H7200>seen<s%> <S%H669>Ephraim,<s%> like <S%H6865>Tyre,<s%> <S%H8362>planted<s%> in a pleasant <S%H5116>place;<s%> but <S%H669>Ephraim<s%> will bring <S%H3318>out<s%> his <S%H1121>children<s%> to the <S%H2026>murderer.<s%>
<S%H5414>Give<s%> <S%H3068>them<s%>â€”Yahweh what will you <S%H5414>give?<s%> <S%H5414>Give<s%> them a <S%H7921>miscarrying<s%> <S%H7358>womb<s%> and <S%H6784>dry<s%> <S%H7699>breasts.<s%>

"All their <S%H7451>wickedness<s%> is in <S%H1537>Gilgal;<s%> for there I <S%H8130>hated<s%> <S%H7455>them.<s%> Because of the wickedness of their <S%H4611>deeds<s%> I will drive them <S%H1644>out<s%> of my <S%H1004>house!<s%> I will <S%H160>love<s%> them no <S%H3254>more.<s%> All their <S%H8269>princes<s%> are <S%H5637>rebels.<s%>

<S%H669>Ephraim<s%> is <S%H5221>struck.<s%> Their <S%H8328>root<s%> has dried <S%H3001>up.<s%> They will <S%H6213>bear<s%> no <S%H6529>fruit.<s%> Even though they bring <S%H3205>forth,<s%> yet I will <S%H4191>kill<s%> the <S%H4261>beloved<s%> ones of their <S%H990>womb.<s%>"
My <S%H430>God<s%> will cast them <S%H3988>away,<s%> because they did not <S%H8085>listen<s%> to <S%H5074>him;<s%> and they will be wanderers among the <S%H1471>nations.<s%>
